DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About Automic's Team Foundation Server Package ==============================================
This package contains actions to interact with a given TFS instance. It uses the tf utility provided by TFS.
=Setup=
* Requires the tf utility to perform commands via the commandline. Should support TFS 2005, TFS 2008 & TFS 2010. The tf utility comes with visual studio professional(+) or as a part of the team explorer, both need to have the corresponding version (TFS 2005 - VS2005 - TE2005, etc.). Default value of Tf utility path is "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\Tf.exe" and user can change this default value in 'PCK.AUTOMIC_TFS.PRV.INCLUDE.ENSURE_UTILITY_PATH' object.
=Rollback=
The TFS actions do not support rollbacks yet.
